des:
Here’s a step by step guide:
1. Download our "Computherm B Series" app in Google Play;
2. Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered);
3. Turn on Computherm B Series devices and connect them with "Computherm B Series" app;
4. Give your devices friendly names;
5. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
6. IMPORTATNT: "Alexa" app use by defaults Fahrenheit for temperature measurement. You need to change it to Celsius from "Alexa" app settings;
7. Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Computherm B Series";
8. Click Enable skill of "Computherm B Series", then login with your Computherm credentials on the linking page;
9. Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices;
10. If you register new devices talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices" to find them;

Here are the voice commands Computherm B Series has:

THERMOSTAT
Alexa, turn on the thermostat
Alexa, set the thermostat to twenty degrees
Alexa, set the thermostat to cool
Alexa, make it warmer in here
Alexa, increase thermostat by two degrees
Alexa, on what setpoint is my thermostat set to?
Alexa, what is the temperature in here?

HUMIDIFIER
Alexa, turn on the humidifier
Alexa, set the humidifier to thirty percent.
Alexa, increase humidifier by ten percent.
Alexa, decrease humidifier by twenty percent.

SMARTPLUG
Alexa, turn on the smart plug
Alexa, turn off the smart plug

SWITCH
Alexa, turn on the switch
Alexa, turn off the switch

DOOR
Alexa, open the door
Alexa, close the door
